__e: Father has suffered so much, and is worse than usual this morning.
I have not suffered for eight months for to see you soak up lagers.
He'd suffered enough already, and I wanted to make it up to him. But now I've let him down. How?
You cannot die until you have suffered... the same way that I have suffered.
I had no idea how much you'd suffered, but I remember the person you used to be.
Sorry I hurt you so much.
I've never seen a man so broken up over a woman:
and I regret only one thing that he suffered so little.
You know, when you've loved and lost the way Frank has, then you know what life's about.
If you've had enough of suffering, then make them stop.
With little girls just like you! With many sorrows, but very happy all together.
One thing I ask, not only for myself, but for the honor of all who suffer.
It's been so long. Do you know the pain I've endured?
Only my son knows how I have suffered as I watched each of them die.
That is what you want to hear, isn't it, how I have suffered, how every moment of my life has been a living a hell?
